long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Browsing Efficiency with Hot Corners!

Make every corner of your browser work for you with the Hot Corners extension! This innovative tool transforms your browser corners into smart triggers, allowing you to perform actions quickly by just flicking your mouse towards any corner of the screen.

Key Features:

Customizable Actions: Set different actions for each corner of your browser window. Choose from opening new tabs, accessing bookmarks, viewing history, managing downloads, or even custom URLs — all at the speed of a mouse flick.

Adjustable Sensitivity: Customize the sensitivity of the Hot Corners to suit your workflow. Adjust how close you need to get to a corner to trigger an action and the speed of the mouse movement required, ensuring that each action only happens when you want it to.

Seamless Integration: Works quietly in the background with a minimalist interface that doesn’t clutter your browser. Configure your settings once and enjoy streamlined browsing without additional steps.

Whether you're a professional developer, a student, or just someone looking to boost their productivity, Hot Corners is designed to make your browser more intuitive and responsive to your needs.
